Class PasswordDBField.passwordHistoryEntry

java.lang.Object

Enclosing class:
PasswordDBField
static class PasswordDBField.passwordHistoryEntry
extends java.lang.Object

This nested class holds a previous password hash along with the date that it was committed into this field.

          The date this password history entry was committed to the Ganymede database.
